object.property: Allow the host to automatically join a newly created meeting
Check this option to automatically join every meeting you host
Keep configuration file when Wahay closes
Allow the host to automatically join a newly created meeting
When this option is checked, the configuration settings will be stored in the device.
Be very careful. This information is sensitive and could potentially contain very private information. Only turn on these settings if you absolutely need it for debugging.
Allow the host to automatically join a newly created meeting
Log debug output to the selected log file. If no file is selected then the log output will be written to the default log file.
If you set this option to a file name, low level information will be logged there.
If you want to use your own Mumble instance, please enter the location where Mumble is available in the system.
If you want to set up a custom port to run the Mumble service, please a port number between 1 and 65535
Configuration settings will be lost in the next session
We have detected that the configuration file is invalid or corrupted. Do you want to make a copy (backup) of it and continue?
If you backup the configuration file, we will reset the settings and continue normally. If the configuration file is encrypted, then we will ask you for a password to encrypt the new settings file.
